channel.title: ianwatson – Self directed support
channel.description: Exploring informed choice in the context of self-directed support for disabled young people in transition: A qualitative study

item.title: Self directed support for disabled young people in transition
item.dc:creator: ianwatson
item.description: This blog contains the full text of my MSc dissertation: Exploring informed choice in the context of self-directed support for disabled young people in transition: A qualitative study. The chapters are listed on the left. Please fee free to comment or ask questions.
item.content:encoded:
This blog contains the full text of  my MSc dissertation:

Exploring informed choice in the context of self-directed support for disabled young people in transition: A qualitative study. 

The chapters are listed on the left.  Please fee free to comment or ask questions.
